title: Finalboss Shen????? WOULD BE NICE
body:
Well guys, we all know the old buddy {{champion:98}} , but won't you be happy to see him more often saving you with his Ultimate??? If Riot wants, that {{champion:98}}  is played more often, why don't get a new skin for him? There are already Support and Midlane Finalboss Skins ({{champion:45}} and {{champion:53}} ).
So, you wanna see shen more often? I DO!
It would be very nice if you get one for this sneaky Tank, it will increase his popularity, too!!

Greetings, IvelSlyker!

replies.body:
Ich denke das in zukunft noch mehr final Bosse auftauchen werden.

Shen sieht man doch eh in letzter zeit des√∂fteren (zumindest ich)
